meta.name: description
meta.content: Volusia County Schools. The mission of Volusia County Schools is ensuring all students receive a superior 21st century education.

div.span: Distance Learning to continue for the remainder of the school year.

Governor Ron DeSantis has announced that distance learning will continue throughout the State of Florida for the remainder of the school year.
Read More
Live Chat Hotline for Teachers, Students, and Families: 386-626-0070.

This hotline is for questions regarding your student's online instruction. The hotline is open Monday through Friday from 8:30 a.m. to 3 p.m.
Read More

a.title: News and Events at Volusia County Schools
